actions.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 312 (Roll no. 115).

description: Amendment sought to authorize expedited procedures for procurement of information technology by the Immigration and Naturalization Service.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 107-419 to allow for expedited and simplified procurement of products or services; to provide that such authority lasts until 2004 and to require a report not later than one year after the end of FY 2004 concerning the use of these authorities.
